entry.title: Ukraine's New Offensive Is Fueled by Captured Russian Weapons
entry.content: Ukraine’s rapid breakthrough in the Kharkiv region a month ago ended up putting hundreds of pieces of Russian armor into Kyiv’s hands, military officials say.

entry.title: Markets Break When Interest Rates Rise Fast: Here Are the Cracks
entry.content: Turmoil in Britain exposes potential risks facing pensions and government bond markets, longtime havens in periods of financial upheaval. “There are no immaculate tightening cycles. Stuff breaks.”
